titleStmt.title: James F. Robinson, Jr., Receipt to Kentucky Central Rail Road Company
CWG13749

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 6

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To Kentucky Central Rail Road Co Dr.

row.cell:
To transportation from Lexington to Covington
266 Bxs ord. Stores 320000lbs @ 30Â¢
Shipped from Frankfort & Covington during the advance into Kentucky of Confederate forces under Brig Genl Jno Morgan --

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

J F Robinson jr Q M G
R A Athey
Asst adjt genl Ky vols
Received at Frankfort, the 28th of Aug 1863, of J. F. Robinson jr, Quartermaster ^Genl^ Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Ninety Six Dollars and Cents, in full of the above account.

26
NO. 12.
No. 28 Abstract B Q Qr. 186
Kentucky Central R R Co
Dollars 96xx/100
Paid Aug 28th 1863
Transportation
J220
